item.value: The shortest woman was Pauline Muster. She was 58 cm ( 23 in ) tall.
The heaviest apple weighed 1.849 kg (4 lb 1 oz) and was grown and picked by Chisato Iwasaki at his apple farm in Hirosaki City, Japan October 24, 2005.
In the Summer of 1896 the first modern Olympics was held in Athens, Greece. The 2012 Olympics will be held in London.
There are 206 bones in the adult human body and are 300 in children. As children age some bones fuse together.
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world. It is 8850 meters (29035ft) high.
John Logie Baird was the inventor of the world's first working television system in Hastings, England in 1923.
There are 195 countries in the world and there are more than 2,700 languages.
Michael Jackson's 1982 Thriller album is the biggest seller of all time. Over 110 millions albums were sold.
The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean in the world. It covers about 1/3 of its surface.
The Cheetah is the fastest land animal. It can run at 112 kilometres per hour (70 mph). The average person can run from 12 - 17 miles an hour in sprints, so keep away from cheetahs.
The city with the largest population is Shanghai in China. It has almost 14 million inhabitants.
The Earth orbits the Sun at an average speed of 29.79 km/s ( 67,000 miles/hour).
English is the second most spoken language in the world.
Electric eels can stun both predators and prey with electric shocks of around 500 volts.
About two thirds of the Earth's surface is covered with water.
Intel introduces the first microprocessor, the Intel 4004 on November 15, 1971.
A sneeze generates a wind of 166 km/hr (100 mi/hr), and a cough moves out at 100 km/hr (60 mi/hr).
The shortest person in the world is Khagendra Thapa Maga. He is 56 cm ( 22 in ) tall. The shortest woman was Pauline Muster. She was 58 cm ( 23 in ) tall.
Alaska is the largest state in America.

The original Olympic Games were a series of athletic competitions held in Ancient Greece. In the Summer of 1896 the first modern Olympics was held in Athens, Greece. The 2012 Olympics will be held in London.
